name: Sterben
description:
Welcome to Sterben-land!

A land of fun, joy, and platforming! Jump your way to victory and have fun!  Inspired by arcade games such as the Original Mario, and Battle toads, this game comes with a three live system, you lose all three? Well, looks like you will have to start from the beginning!

Also on GameJolt: 

https://gamejolt.com/games/STERBENGAME/342496

Due to Itch.io's user interface, new updates will take longer to release here, so visit GameJolt for more common updates.
